attributes.action: Examine the provision of common London accommodation for MPs.
attributes.additional_details: Some MPs earn rental on second homes. Many claim significant expenses for energy.
attributes.background: Members of parliament do not require extra housing in London if there is centralised accommodation provided such as that used by university students. MPs claim the costs of running a second home, including energy paid from taxes.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/633244
